member.name: T:Rock.Enums.Blocks.Cms.ContentCollectionView.SearchOrder
member.summary: The search order options available in the Content Collection View block.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Blocks.Cms.ContentCollectionView.SearchOrder.Relevance
member.summary: The most relevant will be displayed first, this is based on the score.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Blocks.Cms.ContentCollectionView.SearchOrder.Newest
member.summary: The document with the highest relevance date time will be displayed first.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Blocks.Cms.ContentCollectionView.SearchOrder.Oldest
member.summary: The document with the oldest relevance date time will be displayed first.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Blocks.Cms.ContentCollectionView.SearchOrder.Trending
member.summary: The most popular documents will be displayed first. This is determined by the trending values and will then fall back to best match.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Blocks.Cms.ContentCollectionView.SearchOrder.Alphabetical
member.summary: The documents will be displayed alphabetically, A-Z.

member.name: T:Rock.Enums.Cms.ContentCollectionFilterControl
member.summary: Defines the type of UI controls that can be rendered for filters on the content collection pages.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Cms.ContentCollectionFilterControl.Pills
member.summary: Filter will be rendered as a pill and will behave as either a radio button or checkbox.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Cms.ContentCollectionFilterControl.Dropdown
member.summary: Filter will be rendered as a dropdown selection.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Cms.ContentCollectionFilterControl.Boolean
member.summary: Filter will be rendered as a single boolean option.

member.name: T:Rock.Enums.Controls.SlidingDateRangeType
member.summary: Also defined in Rock.Web.UI.Controls.SlidingDateRangePicker, so if changed, please update there as well

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Controls.SlidingDateRangeType.All
member.summary: All

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Controls.SlidingDateRangeType.Last
member.summary: The last X days,weeks,months, etc (inclusive of current day,week,month,...) but cuts off so it doesn't include future dates

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Controls.SlidingDateRangeType.Current
member.summary: The current day,week,month,year

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Controls.SlidingDateRangeType.DateRange
member.summary: The date range

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Controls.SlidingDateRangeType.Previous
member.summary: The previous X days,weeks,months, etc (excludes current day,week,month,...)

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Controls.SlidingDateRangeType.Next
member.summary: The next X days,weeks,months, etc (inclusive of current day,week,month,...), but cuts off so it doesn't include past dates

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Controls.SlidingDateRangeType.Upcoming
member.summary: The upcoming X days,weeks,months, etc (excludes current day,week,month,...)

member.name: T:Rock.Enums.Controls.TimeUnitType
member.summary: Also defined in Rock.Web.UI.Controls.SlidingDateRangePicker, so if changed, please update there as well

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Controls.TimeUnitType.Hour

member.summary: The week

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Controls.TimeUnitType.Month

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Controls.TimeUnitType.Year
member.summary: The year

member.name: T:Rock.Enums.EnumDomainAttribute
member.summary: Special use attribute to help the code generation tool know what domain the legacy enums from the Rock.Model namespace actually belong to.

member.name: P:Rock.Enums.EnumDomainAttribute.Domain
member.summary: Gets the domain the Enum type belongs to.

member.name: M:Rock.Enums.EnumDomainAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Rock.Enums.Event.InteractiveExperienceApprovalStatus
member.summary: Represents the approval status for the Interactive Experience system.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Event.InteractiveExperienceApprovalStatus.Pending
member.summary: Answer is pending and has not been reviewed by a moderator.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Event.InteractiveExperienceApprovalStatus.Approved
member.summary: Answer has been approved by a moderator.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Event.InteractiveExperienceApprovalStatus.Rejected
member.summary: Answer has been rejected by a moderator.

member.name: T:Rock.Enums.Event.InteractiveExperiencePushNotificationType
member.summary: Represents the type of push notification to use for the Interactive Experience system when posting questions.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Event.InteractiveExperiencePushNotificationType.Never
member.summary: A push notification is never sent when a question is posted.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Event.InteractiveExperiencePushNotificationType.EveryAction
member.summary: A push notification is always sent when a question is posted.

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Event.InteractiveExperiencePushNotificationType.SpecificActions
member.summary: The moderator decides if the push notification should be sent when they post a question.

member.name: T:Rock.Enums.Reporting.FieldFilterSourceType
member.summary: The sources of current value that can be used when building custom filtering logic.This currently has only Attribute, but would later be expanded to include other sources (such as properties).

member.name: F:Rock.Enums.Reporting.FieldFilterSourceType.Attribute
member.summary: The value will be read from an entity attribute value.
